text: Achalume niwali wakwajimila achakongwe (walume ni ntwe wewasa), ligongo lyanti Allah wachimbichisye wane mwa jamanjao kwapunda wane (achalume kwapunda achakongwe), soni ligongo lya chipanje chao chaakuwa ali nkutola. Sano achimmasyeto wambone niwali wakumanya, wakuligosa (yilu yao nigosa yipanje yaliwasa) atamuno achiwammakwao pali pangali, ligongo lyanti Allah wagosile (achimmasyetowo kupitila mwa achiwammakwao waakwapaga yaakulajila). Sano awala (achimmasyeto) wankukujogopa kuliikwesya kwao basi mwajamukani, (naga ngaakupikana) mwawunduchilani pagona, (naga kuunduka ngakukamuchisya) mwaputani (kwangaulasya), sano naga ali nkumpikanila, basi ngasimwasosela matala (gakwalagachisya). Chisimu Allah ni jwaali Jwapenani kusyene, Jwankulungwa nnope
